segments.text: Hello . I would like to buy some business cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . How many would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to fill out this form , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All I want is the same thing on this card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be no problem , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... Okay , I'm finished . Here's your form and my old card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good , sir . Your order will be ready in one week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you could finish it in three days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , sir . But it will cost you extra .
segments.speaker: S2
